nodes.text: A robo-vassal was a subordinate type of droid employed in the service of the upper-class or well-to-do citizen. As of 2 BBY, the presence of robo-vassals in a private residence indicated a certain level of luxury: for instance, robo-vassals could be found in the home of House Glayyd, the most powerful of the ancient houses of the planet Ammuud.
